1stPhrase: Find refugees with needs that match the areas you want to help in, contact them and help them
2ndPhrase: Express your needs, get your voice heard and hopefully find a suitable help
3rdPhrase: Share your experience with other refugees to help them avoid the problems you have been through
para1S: Getting specific help never been made easier
para2S: Provide help to refugees that match the areas you want ot help in
para3S: Share your experince with other refugees to help them overcome their problems
para4S: Read success stories of refugees who built a better life in their new country
